name: Bucket Guy
description:
Where's Waldo meets bullet hell!

Bucket Guy is starving for colored paint in his gray world... Help him stay alive :D

Submitted to the Quarantine Jam. The theme was "a lot of...". We tried to match the theme by having "a lot of things displayed at once" in "a lot of space" and ended up with a mix of a bullet hell with a "find the object" game.

by @sadripa @JamieBakerSound @nitaku @saalazar

Sound Design / Composition: JamieBakerSound (www.jamiebakersound.com)
